name: Bow & Arrow Bird & Balloon Hunter: Shoot Apple & Rescue Hangman
name_original: Bow & Arrow Bird & Balloon Hunter: Shoot Apple & Rescue Hangman
description:
Attention! Kids, Children and even Adults if you ever wanted to be an expert bowman here is your chance to become like Robin Hood in this Fun arcade adventure game of Bow & Arrow Archer Apple Shoot. Be a Top class, world champion archer, come along and play this arcade game of cat and mouse. Learn to wield the cross bow as an Olympian archer and win points over and over in Fun and interesting way.
Aim the bow filled with arrow towards the target and just shoot, don’t hesitate. Just keep in mind the projectile which is very important, and voila’ you are an expert Archer.
This is not just a Shooting game this is an archery game with interesting scenarios and situations. You will love Different characters, best designed environments and terrain. This surely will make you an Expert bowman. If you are expecting to shoot bear, lion, tiger and other wild beasts then brace yourself because there are none. Instead you will be shoot all kinds of stuff like oranges, apples, melons, grapefruits, vegetables. Also you will help pop balloons floating away in a given time.
This game will make your head spin and your will not put your Apple device down.

Features:

Learn multiple hours of archery and become expert.
Suitable for all, kids and adults alike.
Enjoy the best Graphics with interesting scenery and situations.
Relish stimulating and original background sounds.
Exquisite game design to improve your motor and cognitive skills.

Disclaimer:
Game Name is FREE to download and play, with third part advertisements appearing.
